summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PDF Master application with 17 PDF tools. Backend APIs tested with 17/18 endpoints passing (94% success rate). Frontend UI tested with full navigation, tool functionality, and user interface validation. Fixed one critical backend bug in PDF compression.

fixed_bugs.issue: Page compression was called before adding to PdfWriter causing 'Page must be part of a PdfWriter' error
fixed_bugs.fix_applied: Moved compression call after adding page to writer

passed_tests: Homepage loads with all 17 PDF tool cards
Tool navigation works correctly for all tools
PDF Compress API endpoint (200 OK - after fix)
Extra input fields for tools requiring parameters
Responsive UI design with glassmorphism effects
